name: Play dough Islands.
description:
Team Name: mindsurferdev

Gameplay Instructions: 

WASD + Space to move around.  
Left and right click to punch. 

Idea: I made a game about a really old technique thats still got charm today, stop motion. 

Lore: The main character "Lady" stumbles across TRUE HORROR in a cave on a floating island in the sky. 

Gameplay: When you punch the enemy its play dough becomes loose and falls off. If it hits a surface it breaks up into little pieces. 

GameJam details: Made by mindsurferdev 
None of the sound effects are mine except for the voice acting.
